text: IPA or Integrated Process Automation is a company located in Bangalore, India which specialises in manufacturing, R&D;, and production of load cells, vibration switches and other industrial automation systems. Started by a scientist in 1977, this company established itself as a pioneer in load cell R&D; and industrial automation systems development. http://www.ipaindia.com/ Category:Manufacturing companies based in Bangalore
